info.name: Thalamus, ventral postero-medial nucleus
info.description: The ventral posteromedial thalamic nucleus (VPM) deals with somatosensory information from the head. Input to this nucleus is from the trigeminothalamic tracts. It sends efferents to post-central gyrus of cerebral cortex via the posterior limb of the internal capsule.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/4 Sag Thin Sec
